rows.label: qev065201_MSG0003
rows.name: Oh, [ST:playername ]. Good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Processing the data took time, but I'm finally close to
the information about my sisters. Once I have that,
I should be able to free them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0005
rows.name:
Ha ha! A powerless little Definian like you believes she
can thwart her mother's ambitions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0006
rows.name:
Not alone. But with [ST:playername ]'s help,
absolutely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0007
rows.name:
...Er, right? I'm sure you'll be able to overcome any
trick or trap she throws our way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev065201_SEL0011
rows.name: Nod confidently.

rows.label: qev065201_JNK0020
rows.name: Fret

rows.label: qev065201_SEL0021
rows.name: Frown and say that you're not so sure.

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0008
rows.name:
And what will a single human do? That pathetic
creature is just another marionette dancing at my
command.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0009
rows.name:
[ST:gender p1=He p2=She ] isn't like us Definians. If you look [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] in the eye,
see [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] confidence and resolve, and still feel nothing...
then I pity you, Mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0010
rows.name:
You have chosen a pathetic champion in this fight.
This meager wretch is no match for my daughters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0011
rows.name:
Humans push through doubt as they find their own
way. I see it as proof of their strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0012
rows.name:
Worry not, [ST:playername ].
My sisters have no will of their own.
You will never lose to them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0013
rows.name: ...All right. The analysis is complete.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0014
rows.name:
...Wh-what?! Could Mother and so few Definians
really control all of my sisters?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0015
rows.name:
If this is true, then freeing my sisters should be easy—
we just have to dispose of the three Definians in that
base.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0016
rows.name:
Aaaah ha ha ha! You honestly think that THING there
is capable of defeating the three sisters?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0017
rows.name:
They are my finest masterpieces among all Definians!
If you so much as approach them, your death will be
assured.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0018
rows.name:
I imagine this will be the last request I ever make of
you, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0019
rows.name:
Will you put an end to my kind's long history of
deception and subjugation?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0020
rows.name: Thank you. I knew I could count on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0021
rows.name:
I'll obtain the access code to the base from Mother
now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0022
rows.name: That should allow you to face the three sisters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0028
rows.name:
Hmm. It looks like the data block containing that access
code is quite heavily protected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0029
rows.name:
I'll take another crack at breaking into it here.
Perhaps you can also try prying it out of her yourself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0030
rows.name:
Even with Mother gone, my kind cannot be free from
her will so long as the three sisters live.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0031
rows.name:
You must head to their base in Cauldros and put an
end to this forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0032
rows.name:
I am sorry, but I just don't think I have the technical
skill to break through Mother's encryption.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0033
rows.name:
It would take someone with truly exceptional
knowledge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0034
rows.name:
Do you have any ideas? This city is a gathering place
for all kinds of aliens, after all, though I do not know
many of them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0035
rows.name:
...He's from the future? Well, if true, he may well know
how to crack Mother's protection.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0036
rows.name: But is it? True, I mean. It's a bit hard to swallow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0037
rows.name:
Even with Mother under our control, my kind cannot be
free from her will so long as the three sisters live.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0038
rows.name:
You must head to their base in Cauldros and put an
end to this forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0039
rows.name:
The voice that was always being broadcast into my
head has finally fallen silent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0040
rows.name: ...Is it truly over?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev065201_SEL0031
rows.name: Report that you killed the three sisters.

rows.label: qev065201_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev065201_SEL0041
rows.name: Explain that hostile Definian forces still remain.

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0041
rows.name:
Thank you. Now we can all finally be free of the
manufactured madness Mother and the sisters forced
upon us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0042
rows.name:
We Definians are by nature a weak-willed people.
That's why we were so easily coerced into crime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0043
rows.name:
With the ones controlling my sisters removed,
I can promise we'll make no further trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0044
rows.name:
We'll simply blend into the things around us and
live out peaceful, quiet lives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0045
rows.name:
Thank you for all that you've done,
and for being so kind to someone like me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0046
rows.name: Take this. It's the least I can do in return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0047
rows.name:
I may not still look like this, but I'll be around the city.
Let's meet again someday.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0048
rows.name:
The voice that was always being broadcast into my
head has finally fallen silent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0049
rows.name: ...Is it all finally over?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev065201_SEL0051
rows.name: Report that you killed the three sisters.

rows.label: qev065201_JNK0060
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev065201_SEL0061
rows.name: Explain that hostile Definian forces still remain.

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0050
rows.name:
Thank you. Now we can all finally be free of the
manufactured madness Mother and the sisters forced
upon my sisters and I.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0051
rows.name:
We Definians are by nature a weak-willed people.
That's why we were so easily coerced into crime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0052
rows.name:
With the ones controlling my sisters removed,
I can promise they'll make no further trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0053
rows.name:
They'll simply blend into the things around them and
live out peaceful, quiet lives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0054
rows.name:
Thank you for all that you've done,
and for being so kind to someone like me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0055
rows.name: Take this. It's the least I can do in return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0056
rows.name:
I may not still look like this, but I'll be around the city.
Let's meet again someday.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0057
rows.name: All right... C'mon, Mom![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0058
rows.name:
Ow! I will not be manhandled in this way!
I am the ruler of all spa—HEY! What are you doing?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0059
rows.name:
You're not ruler of anything anymore, Mom.
You're just a chatty ball, and I'm here to make sure
that you never forget it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065201_MSG0060
rows.name:
Rrrgh! This is a violation of my rights and autonomy!
Your parents should be ashamed![ST:wait ]
